Lou,
With " famous mei " like that, if you want to have it shinsa, better send it 
directly to Japan ( after having it looked over by Jim and/or Cary first ).
Oversea shinsa, being " so rushed ", the shinsa team will be hesitant to pass 
a big name  ( not that they won't ).  Just my personal opinion, of course.

Milt
